programme.title: Armour Of God

programme.title: The Changeover
programme.desc: Based on the Carnegie Medal-winning novel by Margeret Mahy, this film follows sixteen-year-old New Zealander Laura, who lives in a low-rent suburb with her mother and four-year-old brother, Jacko. When an ancient spirit attacks Jacko and slowly draws the life out of him, Laura discovers her true identity and the supernatural ability within her, and must harness it to save her brother’s life.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2

programme.title: Race To Victory: WWII Europe

programme.title: Edge Of Existence

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom has to keep his mom, Olivia, distracted while Jun, Alex, and D’Angelo use a new dragon to close off a cave leading to the Crystal Realm, and prevent her from discovering the dragons.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Turbo is surprised to learn that somebody in town is pretending to be him and must find the imposter before they can cause more trouble. // Turbo is invited to a fancy dinner party in his honor but learns that he is actually on the menu, so it's up to the crew to save him.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Julien teams up with Timo, the tenrec, a scientist who the King elists to automate everything in the kingdom.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Oh and Tip discover an underground cult living in the sewers./While Tip is home with a fever, she witnesses a crime committed by her scheming neighbor, Donny.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Shelby, Peabody & Sherman's biggest fan, accidentally gets sucked into the show; Queen Isabella falls for a scam and loses all her money.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Hiccup and the gang must rescue Stoick with assistance from… Berk’s archenemy Alvin.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Jun breaks the rules by sneaking a small, adorable dragon out of the Crystal Realm and bringing it home, but finds that her older brother, Eugene, has arrived and watches her every move.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Odlulu wants to get off the naughty list so she goes around the world and tries to "help" celebrations. Unfortunately she does the opposite which means Waldo and Wenda need to clean up her mess to reinstate Christmas!

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Power Outage – Part 1: A Powerful Foe When Scare School falls victim to the Baccora, Kibosh encourages the students to work together, setting booby-traps and building defences. Power Outage – Part 2: Razznik's Revenge Creature by creature, the evil entity, Baccora, robs Scare School of its powers and locks them into a magical cleptor.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Action-hero Deltoid suddenly loses all his strength and finds himself totally helpless. Noddy quickly starts an investigation: How can he help Deltoid get his strength back?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa wants to show Topsy his three favourite things. But when he gets to his friends house, they have disappeared. Raa Raa and his friends set out on a noisy adventure to find the missing objects

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Mimi's munching some honey sandwiches at the Hutch when Jess comes to visit. She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: Jess is excited to tell the children at home all about the Owl he heard Hoo Hoo'ing in the night and he wants to let us hear it. He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhmini’s hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years she’s been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Stormfly is captured by a new enemy, Ryker Grimborn, and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup, Toothless and the team must rescue her before it's too late

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After a strange creature bites Tuffnut, he believes he'll turn into a legendary Lycanwing dragon when the moon is full unless his friends can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Snotlout and Astrid must fly a ceremonial battle axe to a family wedding, they must work together when an Armorwing dragon derails their plan

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After heroes Hiccup and Toothless save Barf and Belch's life, the grateful Zippleback tries to repay its life debt and abandons riders Ruff and Tuff

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Determined to create a key to the Dragon Eye, Ryker heads to Glacier Island to find the dangerous Snow Wraith being protected by the Dragon Riders

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Unaware of the war on Dragon's Edge, Hiccup, Snotlout and Johann discover an island full of dragons that have been wounded by the Dragon Hunters

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When a new dragon is found in Edge Cove, the Dragon Riders must help the Sea Shocker escape a group of hungry Scauldrons

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When the Skrill returns with a vendetta against Hiccup and Toothless, the Dragon Riders must choose a new course of action to stop the vicious dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: When they learn the Dragon Hunters are tracking the Flightmare, Hiccup and Astrid race to stop them after Heather spills secrets from Viggo Grimborn

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must develop a plan to outwit this dangerous new enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS

programme.title: SailGP: Racing on the Edge

programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: Smurfette and her friends go to the Forbidden Forest to find a lost village. When the evil wizard Gargamel gets to know of this, he devises a plan to stop the smurfs from discovering the town.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates (S8)

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop (S2)
programme.desc: Shorty tries to match the Ember Glow hemi's original color, then works his magic in the paint booth.

programme.title: Super Dad (S2)
programme.desc: A father of three has two sons with sickle cell disease. Taylor helps him create a geodesic dome that allows his kids to safely enjoy the outdoors.

programme.title: Super Dad (S2)
programme.desc: Taylor Calmus helps an adventurous father of three create a larger-than-life, camp-inspired play area for his kids to embrace the great outdoors.

programme.title: Dual Survival: Colombia (S1)
programme.desc: Adventurer Filipe Restrepo and army veteran Arnoby Sinam Alba head to wild and remote regions of Columbia to demonstrate how the right skills can keep you alive.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt Renovation (S3)
programme.desc: A family of four hunts for a beachside fixer-upper in Mathews, VA.

programme.title: Super Street Garage (S1)
programme.desc: Back in the day, the Miata was a cute roadster, before evolving into a fun, stylish track car. Today, TikTok memes and dancing headlights have tarnished its rep.

programme.title: Reality Ranis Of The Jungle (S1)
programme.desc: The money challenge yields an unexpected twist, dramatically altering the game. Two strong queens are nominated for the survival challenge.

programme.title: Expedition Files (S1)

programme.title: Border Control: Spain (S5)
programme.desc: Follows the interventions of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Spain who are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Fritz Meinecke - Facing The Unknown (S1)
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of the survivors of Flight 571, a journey across the Andes!

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: The Misfits, Angel Dempsey and rookie miner, Cody Polglase, must find an opal king stone for a bespoke pendant order. Oscar and Luca are forced above ground.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: Slim Pickings’ efforts to recycle precious dam water are derailed. The Blacklighters scrounge for any last opal in their Land of Promise Claim.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: Sam smashes opal with a jackhammer in the Bushmen’s mine. Plus, Rod and Les make a wager that will force the loser to wear one of Sam’s pink shirts.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters (S7)
programme.desc: The Cheals' dreams of expanding their Opal Empire with partner Mark Bressan are crushed by the reality of juggling two mines.

programme.title: Belly Of The Beast Bigger And Bloodier

programme.title: Fish Or Die (S1)
programme.desc: The crew travels to the Land Down Under where Aboriginal guides will take them to a Barra fisherman's paradise.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law’s affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has post‐traumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firm’s VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Dying For A Crown

programme.title: It's Beginning To Look A Lot Like Murder

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: Airline Wars

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)

programme.title: Got To Leave Something

programme.title: Donsol
programme.desc: In this film, Donsol is a place of refuge for the butanding but also a holding pen for lost and lonely people who wish for things they are no longer likely to get. Will Daniel and Teresa's newfound bond be strong or will it be blown along with the amihan wind which signals the end of the butanding migratory visit to the small town?

programme.title: Secrets Of The Otherworld

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: Further investigation has the fellowship suspecting multiple secretive operations took place on Lot 5, possibly related to the Garden Shaft.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: After two years of waiting, the team receives the Muon topography data and learns that the cavity known as Aladdin's Cave may have more secrets to tell.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: It's back to the Forged in Fire Colosseum for two more intense one-on-one battles. The defending champion has taken down two opponents, including a two-time Gladiator of the Forge.

programme.title: The Lilian Velez Story, Till Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: She was a famous young soprano turned movie actress, while he was a former child actor trying to make it as a leading man. They made a good pair on the screen. He loved her and saw their team-up as salvation of his waning career. Unable to accept the truth, he stabbed her to death one evening.

programme.title: Jessica Alfaro Story
programme.desc: One more look at the shocking Vizconde rape and murder case. This time, from the point of view of self-confessed star witness to the crime, the controversial Jessica Alfaro.

programme.title: Blondie
programme.desc: Lorna (Ilonah Jean) and her friends are gripped in fear as a serial killer is on the loose. But a pattern soon emerges. The victims are all men and a girl in blood wig is seen fleeing the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Simaron
programme.desc: As a martial arts expert, a graduate of the Police Academy of America and the son of a retired general, Cris could have had all the privileges possible for a career in the armed forces. However, like many of the heroes he had idolized since childhood, he chosed to go undercover.

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Libingan Ng Mga Buhay
programme.desc: This is the true story of Rodolfo Fuentes who was unjustly sent to jail at the very young age of 14.

programme.title: Marami Ka Pang Kakaining Bigas
programme.desc: Eddie Garcia played a veteran cop who rose from the ranks and who survived by his wits. Joko Diaz, on the other hand, was a young graduate from the police academy who did everything by the book.

programme.title: Pusoy Dos
programme.desc: It is non-stop laughter as Janno Gibbs and Dennis Padilla got together as Billy and Jack, modern-day Robin Hoods who engaged in petty scums to earn money for the upkeep of a day care center for indigent children.

programme.title: Macario Durano
programme.desc: When a corrupt police captain and his henchmen framed up Durano for a crime he did not commit. He then escaped from prison with revenge foremost in his mind.

programme.title: Bad Boy (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This was the landmark film that launched Robin Padilla to stardom as one of the biggest action stars in the Philippine cinema. Robin played a young man branded as "bad boy" for life because as a kid he killed his father in defense of his mother.

programme.title: Like Father, Like Son (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The box-office idols of the 60's played parents to a young crop of talented comedians in this tale about two families. The fun began when the boys decided to try out each other's lifestyles which means getting into trouble for Niño, and books and computers for Herbert.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Pikoy Goes to Malaysia
programme.desc: Tribal customs commands Pikoy to get married. But the union is against his will. He neglects his bride and humiliates his family. As punishment, he is banished from the tribe and forbidden to speak until he is ready to submit himself to the rules.

programme.title: YOKAI
programme.desc: In this episode, we pursue the shape-shifting trickster Mujina. This being associated with raccoon dogs is known on Niigata Prefecture's Sado island as both human and animal, yokai and deity.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Below your eyes is the Sea of Okhotsk in the season of drift ice. Climbers are scaling a huge icefall reaching 40 meters high.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: Kyoto has about 2,700 temples that hold an array of Buddhist statues. Sculptors breathe life into these objects of worship.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Ethical Every Day
programme.desc: Japanese firms are rethinking mass production and disposal. The world's third-largest clothing company is recycling and reusing used clothes. Plus, one firm is reducing e-waste and helping refugees.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life
programme.desc: Japan has a long history of natural disasters. BOSAI explores how to overcome them and save lives with the power of science.

programme.title: The Logic of Coastal Architecture
programme.desc: Niigata / Nishizawa Ryue (architect) In a coastal district, boat builders used their skills to make houses. Nishizawa considers how architecture is affected by a community's terrain and values.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: 75 YEARS ON: THE BATTLE OF OKINAWA
programme.desc: UNTOLD STORIES OF THE BATTLE OF OKINAWA: Women and Teens on the Frontline. 75 years after the battle that claimed the lives of over 120,000 locals, recently discovered documents reveal untold stories.

programme.desc: In Kumamoto, we meet people who cherish their ancestry and nature, such as a traditional inlay artisan, a group passing on the history of the building of an embankment, and a brown cattle breeder.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 10
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori take a risk on a large covered item during an unusual auction. Will the reveal rev their profits or stall their cash flow? It's all determined in the biggest twist yet when their archrival wins a locker that puts the high-rolling couple in the palm of his hand.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 11
programme.desc: Buyers get stung when a locker unleashes a swarm of more than just merchandise. Then, when our buyers back away from a bin piled sky high with rusty office cabinets one hawk-eyed competitor sees something no one else does. And later, Jesse throws down to win antiques, but when the dust settles our winning bidder will discover a treasure trove of concealed cash.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 12
programme.desc: The buyers come face-to-face with one of the strangest lockers ever seen. It's an odd opportunity that sends the bidding through the roof, but when the door is unlocked, Pandora's box reveals a surprise that sends its winning bidder through the roof.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 13
programme.desc: Cash is falling from the sky as our buyers go head to head at the biggest airport auction ever seen. Jesse gambles hard on a mystery box with a telling message. Then, Scott and Chrissy battle it out over a jet-fueled jewel. And later, the crowd is driven to a frenzy when Sean reveals a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that's gonna make one deep-pocketed bidder's dreams come true.

programme.title: Friends S6 4
programme.desc: Injured Joey must get an acting part in order to qualify for health insurance. Rachel finally learns the truth about her marriage to Ross.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce – and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 1
programme.desc: Old rivals come out smokin' in an attempt to uncover some unique finds. When Jesse tries to bump off Brandon and Lori, will he score high or strike out? With the other hunters battling, Scott and Chrissy ride in and sweep up some bargains before thedust settles.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 2
programme.desc: Scott shoots the moon on a bin that may cost him an arm and a leg. Then, T-Money spies a prize that could send him straight to the top. Plus, Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war that could send one of them to the retirement home.And later, the claws come out when the tension between Lori and Chrissy boils over.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 3
programme.desc: With Sean as the captain, the biggest of the big-time bidders head to Marina Del Rey in search of true nautical treasures. In one of the most explosive episodes to date, Scott and Brandon test each others jibs. Only one can swim - the other must sink!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 4
programme.desc: Things get hairy for the hunters as some ring in the money while others go for broke. Desert Dan returns to turn up the heat as T Money continues to march to the beat of his own drum. In a quest to protect their territory, Brandon and Lori go to battle for a bin that could prove to be their most profitable yet.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 5
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 11
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr try to warm up to strangers at a ski lodge and pull up a chair as uninvited guests at an Italian restaurant. And tonight's punishment takes the cake when the loser is the surprise entertainer at the wrong party

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 12
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr celebrate three years of embarrassing each other in this special anniversary edition. The guys reveal some never-before-seen bonus footage of their favorite moments from the vault.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 13
programme.desc: The guys have to keep a straight face as the other Jokers act out bizarre scenes, then they try to get an embarrassing word in edgewise with strangers at the park. And playtime is over for tonight's big loser when the punishment hits a little too close to home.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 14
programme.desc: The guys bite off more than they can chew serving customers at a sub shop, and they team up at a food court to perform a mystery task based on ambiguous hints from their partner. Then, the guys need their memory to get them through a series of commands, and the loser doesn't have the stomach for tonight's punishment, as he experiences the painful pangs of parenthood.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 15
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q, and Murr push all the wrong buttons at a video game store, try to rope rock climbers into repeating a bizarre word, and give away fake tickets to a flop of a show.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 9
programme.desc: Mystery is the name of the game as Brandon and Lori uncover a vintage machine filled with risqu� photos. It's tantalizing, but is it profitable? Then, our buyers lock horns in a bidding war over what could be priceless artwork. And it's every man forhimself when Jesse makes a blind bid that sparks a frenzy, all over an unopened locker.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 10
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori take a risk on a large covered item during an unusual auction. Will the reveal rev their profits or stall their cash flow? It's all determined in the biggest twist yet when their archrival wins a locker that puts the high-rolling couple in the palm of his hand.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 11
programme.desc: Buyers get stung when a locker unleashes a swarm of more than just merchandise. Then, when our buyers back away from a bin piled sky high with rusty office cabinets one hawk-eyed competitor sees something no one else does. And later, Jesse throws down to win antiques, but when the dust settles our winning bidder will discover a treasure trove of concealed cash.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 12
programme.desc: The buyers come face-to-face with one of the strangest lockers ever seen. It's an odd opportunity that sends the bidding through the roof, but when the door is unlocked, Pandora's box reveals a surprise that sends its winning bidder through the roof.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 13
programme.desc: Cash is falling from the sky as our buyers go head to head at the biggest airport auction ever seen. Jesse gambles hard on a mystery box with a telling message. Then, Scott and Chrissy battle it out over a jet-fueled jewel. And later, the crowd is driven to a frenzy when Sean reveals a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that's gonna make one deep-pocketed bidder's dreams come true.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 1
programme.desc: Old rivals come out smokin' in an attempt to uncover some unique finds. When Jesse tries to bump off Brandon and Lori, will he score high or strike out? With the other hunters battling, Scott and Chrissy ride in and sweep up some bargains before thedust settles.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 2
programme.desc: Scott shoots the moon on a bin that may cost him an arm and a leg. Then, T-Money spies a prize that could send him straight to the top. Plus, Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a do or die bidding war that could send one of them to the retirement home.And later, the claws come out when the tension between Lori and Chrissy boils over.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 3
programme.desc: With Sean as the captain, the biggest of the big-time bidders head to Marina Del Rey in search of true nautical treasures. In one of the most explosive episodes to date, Scott and Brandon test each others jibs. Only one can swim - the other must sink!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 4
programme.desc: Things get hairy for the hunters as some ring in the money while others go for broke. Desert Dan returns to turn up the heat as T Money continues to march to the beat of his own drum. In a quest to protect their territory, Brandon and Lori go to battle for a bin that could prove to be their most profitable yet.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 5
programme.desc: T Money puts his honesty to the test with shocking revelations. Jesse finds a loser bin that could make him a winner. Brandon and Lori think they see treasure in an unlikely place. And the new kids in town are determined to throw everyone off their game.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 8
programme.desc: Luthor challenges Lois to a live telecast debate, though not everything is as it seems. John Henry and Clark face a troubling possibility.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 2
programme.desc: Leo hires Mandy as a consultant to the President.

programme.title: Friends S6 4
programme.desc: Injured Joey must get an acting part in order to qualify for health insurance. Rachel finally learns the truth about her marriage to Ross.

programme.title: Friends S6 5
programme.desc: Joey pretends to be the owner of a Porsche whose owner left his keys at Central Perk. Rachel and Ross get divorced. Chandler and Monica babysit Phoebe's triplets.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce – and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 8
programme.desc: Luthor challenges Lois to a live telecast debate, though not everything is as it seems. John Henry and Clark face a troubling possibility.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 10
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin uncover the difference between a hack and a wack, as they use an onion for cleaning and beer for moisturizer. Plus, they show you the real way to hack your hotel breakfast, and how to defend against your needy neighbor.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin return with an explosion of brand new hacks! Tonight, they cook lasagna in a dishwasher, go back in time to discover some of history's earliest hacks, and learn how to hack breakfast using power tools.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin find out if an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack, welcome socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is really a hack from history. And there's a new doctor in town with his own hacks to save the day.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 03
programme.desc: Our dynamic duo discovers how to hack vodka to taste like top shelf, explores the origin of gin and tonic with Hacks from History, and welcomes a tennis ball into the exclusive All Star club.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 04
programme.desc: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags by discovering the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they welcome rubber gloves to the All Star Club and explore hacks from the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

Hero is a word we often hear in the world of sports, but heroism is not always about achievements on the field of play. 42 tells the story of two men -- the great Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and the legendary Brooklyn Dodgers manager Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford) -- whose brave stand against prejudice forever changed the world by changing the game of baseball. In 1946, Rickey signed Robinson to the team, breaking Major League Baseball's infamous color line. Facing racism from every side, Robinson demonstrated tremendous courage by letting his talent on the field do the talking -- ultimately winning over fans and his teammates, and paving the way for others to follow.

programme.title: The Enforcer
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood returns as Dirty Harry Callahan in this hard-edged thriller. San Francisco police inspector Harry Callahan is assigned a female partner (Tyne Daly), but he has little time to express his displeasure because terrorists kidnap the mayor. Now no holds are barred when Dirty Harry goes into action.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 2
programme.desc: Leo hires Mandy as a consultant to the President.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 7
programme.desc: Craving a little motherly love, Sheldon competes with the gang for his mother's attention when she comes to visit. LAURIE METCALF reprises her role as Sheldon's mother, Mary.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 8
programme.desc: Amy is heartbroken when Bernadette and Penny go shopping for wedding dresses without her.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko
programme.desc: Gynecologist Gorou is shocked when his favorite idol, Ai, becomes his patient. He supports her, but just before her delivery, he is suddenly attacked.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko
programme.desc: Over a decade after Ai's death, Ruby dreams of becoming an idol, but her brother Aqua's interference holds her back, though her passion remains unwavering.

programme.title: Oshi No Ko
programme.desc: Aqua reunites with former child star Kana. He refuses a drama offer but changes his mind upon hearing the producer's name, which links to Ai's phone.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Travelogue

programme.desc: Aralvaimozhi, a town in Tamil Nadu, India, thrives because wind farms provide jobs. But as land prices continue to increase, some residents regret having sold their land long ago.

programme.title: Asia Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) CNA correspondents bring you the top stories of the day with 'live' reports and interviews to keep you up-to-date on the day’s events.

programme.title: The New Locals
programme.desc: Cambodia's busy capital of Phnom Penh is home to about a 1,000 Nigerians who are beginning to seamlessly integrate into their adopted country's culture.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: (Live) The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: The Waves that Changed Us
programme.desc: A nation grapples with the aftermath of the 2004 tsunami, as survivors rebuild their lives. Scientists predict and prepare for the next disaster, offering hope for communities.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: You're probably guilty of it. Walking while scrolling on your phone. Is this habit just good multi-tasking or are we putting ourselves and others around us in danger?

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: (Live) The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: The Waves that Changed Us
programme.desc: Survivors of the 2004 Tsunami in Indonesia share stories of loss and resilience and how they worked with friends from across the globe to rebuild lives and communities shattered by the deadly disaster.

programme.title: Headline News
programme.desc: The latest top stories of the hour.

programme.title: Money Mind
programme.desc: How to go global with tailor-made solutions for Asian shoppers. Inside the Chinese "job hunt hotels" catering for young jobseekers. Why cross-border shopping is gaining popularity among Hongkongers.

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Mid-night Two
programme.desc: Yi Cheng and his friends venture into a haunted mountain that hides an ancient corpse and an eternal ghostly flame. No one who enters the mountain ever returns and at 2:30 AM, Yi Cheng’s friends vanish one by one. While searching for them in the eerie forest, Yi Cheng enters a realm of infinite reincarnation, facing a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Artiste Yin Qing enters Hell's Gate through a supernatural TV show and reunites with her late friend Mei Qi. At Mei Qi's gravesite, Yin Qing encounters Mei Qi's husband, Dong Sheng, and a series of mysterious incidents unfold. She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaiza, an immigrant in Nuuk, struggles to survive after the recent death of her husband. Her life changes when she meets the friendly and caring Mark. This is until Mark disappears without a trace one day, leaving her with baffling mysteries.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Jacqueline Comes Home: The Chiong Story
programme.desc: Based on a true crime that happened in 1997, the story is about an unknown assailant kidnapping two sisters, Jacqueline and Marijoy Chiong. This is one of the most shocking cases of rape and murder in Philippines history.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A mother, her two children and her best friend mysteriously vanish. Investigators find the family's home covered in blood but very few clues. A minute detail helps authorities track down a suspect.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: A young man stabs another man who assaulted his brother and attempted to steal from their family-run petrol station. Was it attempted murder or self defence?

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a young woman dies in a car crash, it's up to the Coroner's Office to trigger an investigation into an accident that may have involved foul play.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Evidence leads detectives in Mobile to believe that a victim was murdered by two gunmen. But the trial leaves the jury wrestling with the question of whether one of the suspects could be found not guilty.

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: For Seth, 23, the only world worth living in is the digital one. His family makes one last attempt to save him. Monya, 55, spends most of her day 'doom-scrolling', but says the problem is with her family.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Marjorie's husband, Irv, has recently been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease and has already taken two dangerous falls in the house where the EMTs could not get to him.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: Bad decisions cause people to get booked in, including a first-timer that resisted arrest for riding their bicycle on the wrong side of the road, a couple that had half a pound of meth.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: an innocent woman insists on going to jail with her arrested BFF; a thief absconds with a giant life-size stick figure; and more!

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S1)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A man decides to interrupt his crime to make a pizza; police track down a man who jumped through the roof of a port-a-potty; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A suspect makes a chilling confession about a string of gruesome crimes; a deadly mistake made by a politician comes to light in the interrogation room; and more.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3)
programme.desc: A woman calls 911 while her family is held hostage by armed home invaders. Police rush to rescue a woman trapped in her burning car. A kidnapper tries to steal a mother's young children at a gas station.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After meeting at a salsa club, Lulu and Ramon Sosa find they make a good team and marry. But after having financial difficulties, the relationship breaks down.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died

programme.desc: Agent Dominick Polifrone poses as a mobster to stop the Iceman; Det. Carlos James goes undercover to thwart a plot against a woman's ex.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episode teach about the objects in the environment, its properties or attributes, its similarities and differences. These episodes also talk about letters and body parts and their uses.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss whole numbers up to 100, ordinal numbers up to 10th, money up to PhP100.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach rhyming words, greetings and leave-takings, and the different elements of a story.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala sa sarili bilang Pilipino gamit ang konsepto ng pagpapatuloy at pagbabago.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pagsasabi ng mensahe, paksa o tema ng patalastas at kuwento. Tinuturo din ng mga palabas na ito ang tungkol sa pagsulat ng parirala at pangungusap.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 1000, ordinal numbers up to 20th, and money up to PhP100. These videos also teach addition of whole numbers up to 1000 including money.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about different sounds, the alphabet, elements of the story, and action words. These also discuss the use of proper and common nouns and a and an.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang kahalagahan ng kinabibilangang komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, iba't ibang bahagi ng aklat, diksyunaryo, at elemento ng kuwento. Ipinapakita rin dito ang pagbabasa at pagbabaybay ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about ways of sorting materials and describing them as solid, liquid or gas based on observable properties.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng mga pangngalan at mga panghalip. Tinatalakay din dito ang pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita, pagtukoy ng mga elemento ng kuwento at pagsagot ng mga tanong tungkol dito.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 100,000. These also teach multiplication and division of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the parts of a paragraph, different resources, and significant details of different text types. These also talk about various ways of identifying the meaning of words.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pagkakakilanlan ng bansa ayon sa mga katangiang heograpikal gamit ang mapa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes focus on grouping different materials based on their properties. These episodes also discuss the changes that materials undergo when exposed to certain conditions.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pangngalan, panghalip, magagalang na pananalita, at mga sanggunian. Pag-uusapan din dito ang pagsagot sa mga tanong, pabibigay ng hinuha, opinyon, solusyon, pagsunod-sunod ng mga pangyayari, at pagsusuri ng maikling pelikula.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the four fundamental operations involving fractions and decimals.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about analyzing images, interpreting the meaning of visual media, and making co ections between information viewed and personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa bahagi ng Pilipinas sa globalisasyon batay sa lokasyon nito sa mundo gamit ang mga kasanayang pangheograpiya at ang ambag ng malayang kaisipan sa pag-usbong ng nasyonalismong Pilipino.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the different types of mixtures and their characteristics and the different techniques to separate mixtures.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri at pagsusulat ng tula, bugtong, sawikain, talata, karunungang-bayan, at pananaliksik.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of factors of polynomials, rational algebraic expressions, linear equations and inequalities in two variables, systems of linear equations and inequalities in two variables and linear functions.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use modals, adverbs, adjectives and nouns. These videos also focus on determining the meaning of words and expressions and citing sources.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa interaksiyon ng tao sa kaniyang kapaligiran na nagbigay-daan sa pag-usbong ng mga sinaunang kabihasnan na nagkaloob ng mga pamanang humubog sa pamumuhay ng kasalukuyang henerasyon.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes are about Newton’s three laws of motion, force, power, and different kinds of energy. These also teach the propagation of sound, properties and characteristics of visible light, heat and temperature, and the effects of heat on the body, and electricity.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa mga mitolohiya, parabula, at nobela. Ipinapaliwanag din dito ang wastong paggamit ng pokus ng pandiwa at panghalip, paggamit ng angkop na hudyat sa pagsunud-sunod ng mga pangyayari.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of sequences, polynomials and polynomial equations.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes show how to use information from various resources, determine the effect of textual aids, and analyzing materials viewed. These videos also focus on evaluating texts.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sanhi at implikasyon ng mga hamong pangkapaligiran upang maging bahagi ng pagtugon na makapagpapabuti sa pamumuhay ng tao.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episode talk about the relationship among the locations of volcanoes, earthquake epicenters, and mountain ranges.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes feature the life of learners under alternative learning system. These episodes also focus on the process of pla ing, setting up, ru ing a small business, and these also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episode teach about the objects in the environment, its properties or attributes, its similarities and differences. These episodes also talk about letters and body parts and their uses.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss whole numbers up to 100, ordinal numbers up to 10th, money up to PhP100.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach rhyming words, greetings and leave-takings, and the different elements of a story.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala sa sarili bilang Pilipino gamit ang konsepto ng pagpapatuloy at pagbabago.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang paggamit ng magagalang na pananalita, pagsasabi ng mensahe, paksa o tema ng patalastas at kuwento. Tinuturo din ng mga palabas na ito ang tungkol sa pagsulat ng parirala at pangungusap.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about whole numbers up to 1000, ordinal numbers up to 20th, and money up to PhP100. These videos also teach addition of whole numbers up to 1000 including money.

programme.title: Grade 2 English

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan ang kahalagahan ng kinabibilangang komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, iba't ibang bahagi ng aklat, diksyunaryo, at elemento ng kuwento. Ipinapakita rin dito ang pagbabasa at pagbabaybay ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach whole numbers up to 10 000, ordinal numbers up to 100th, and money up to PhP1000. These videos also teach addition and subtraction of whole numbers including money.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes discuss about writing different kinds of sentences, descriptive paragraphs, and diaries. These episodes also show how to use common and proper nouns, plural forms of regular and irregular nouns, and how to read words, phrases, and sentences with short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kinalalagyan ng mga lalawigan sa rehiyong kinabibilangan ayon sa katangiang heograpikal nito.
